origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_agriculture_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial policies on the agriculture industry, including the retrieval of policy documents, analysis of support measures, and assessment through loan data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., financial_support, tax_relief.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to be analyzed, e.g., agriculture, manufacturing.'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'loanData', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include loan data in the analysis.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'The detailed analysis of the policy impact on the specified industry.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_agriculture_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'financial_support', 'industry'是'agriculture', 'loanData'是'true'.
